description.name: DNA Extended
description.tagline: DNA Extended is a WHMCS addon that allows you to manage your DomainNameApi account from within WHMCS.
description.long: DNA Extended is a WHMCS addon that allows you to manage your DNA Extended account from within WHMCS. It allows you to create, suspend, unsuspend and terminate accounts, as well as change passwords and change package.
features: Edit bulk Privacy and Domain Lock
